analysis.description:
ProfitContainerAdapter.takeEtherProfits (/unique_chucks/24/0xc85b0c4874b8f06bfb3f9b65f252d60f962e60b7.sol#476-482) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- assert(profitContainerLocation.call.value(this.balance)()) (/unique_chucks/24/0xc85b0c4874b8f06bfb3f9b65f252d60f962e60b7.sol#479-481)
ValueTrader.die (/unique_chucks/24/0xc85b0c4874b8f06bfb3f9b65f252d60f962e60b7.sol#189-192) allows anyone to destruct the contract

ValueTrader.verifiedTransferFrom (/unique_chucks/24/0xc85b0c4874b8f06bfb3f9b65f252d60f962e60b7.sol#326-339) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert((safeSub(balanceAfter,balanceBefore) == amount))

Reentrancy in ValueTrader.buyEther (/unique_chucks/24/0xc85b0c4874b8f06bfb3f9b65f252d60f962e60b7.sol#304-309):
	External calls:
	- assert(valueToToken(etherContract,balances[msg.sender]) >= amount) (/unique_chucks/24/0xc85b0c4874b8f06bfb3f9b65f252d60f962e60b7.sol#307-308)
	- assert(destroyValue(msg.sender,tokenToValue(etherContract,amount))) (/unique_chucks/24/0xc85b0c4874b8f06bfb3f9b65f252d60f962e60b7.sol#308-309)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/24/0xc85b0c4874b8f06bfb3f9b65f252d60f962e60b7.sol#308-309)

Reentrancy in ValueTrader.buyToken (/unique_chucks/24/0xc85b0c4874b8f06bfb3f9b65f252d60f962e60b7.sol#292-301):
	External calls:
	- assert(! (valueToToken(token,balances[msg.sender]) < amount)) (/unique_chucks/24/0xc85b0c4874b8f06bfb3f9b65f252d60f962e60b7.sol#295-296)
	- assert(destroyValue(msg.sender,tokenToValue(token,amount))) (/unique_chucks/24/0xc85b0c4874b8f06bfb3f9b65f252d60f962e60b7.sol#296-297)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/24/0xc85b0c4874b8f06bfb3f9b65f252d60f962e60b7.sol#296-297)

Reentrancy in ShopKeeper.changeOwner (/unique_chucks/24/0xc85b0c4874b8f06bfb3f9b65f252d60f962e60b7.sol#418-428):
	External calls:
	- shop.changeOwner(owner_) (/unique_chucks/24/0xc85b0c4874b8f06bfb3f9b65f252d60f962e60b7.sol#427)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- holderA (/unique_chucks/24/0xc85b0c4874b8f06bfb3f9b65f252d60f962e60b7.sol#428)

Reentrancy in ValueTrader.quickTrade (/unique_chucks/24/0xc85b0c4874b8f06bfb3f9b65f252d60f962e60b7.sol#311-325):
	External calls:
	- tempInValue = safeAdd(tokenToValue(etherContract,msg.value),tokenToValue(tokenFrom,input)) (/unique_chucks/24/0xc85b0c4874b8f06bfb3f9b65f252d60f962e60b7.sol#316-318)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/24/0xc85b0c4874b8f06bfb3f9b65f252d60f962e60b7.sol#318-319)
	- supplyNow (/unique_chucks/24/0xc85b0c4874b8f06bfb3f9b65f252d60f962e60b7.sol#318-319)

Token.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/24/0xc85b0c4874b8f06bfb3f9b65f252d60f962e60b7.sol#65)
Token.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/24/0xc85b0c4874b8f06bfb3f9b65f252d60f962e60b7.sol#65-67)
ValueToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/24/0xc85b0c4874b8f06bfb3f9b65f252d60f962e60b7.sol#71)
ValueToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/24/0xc85b0c4874b8f06bfb3f9b65f252d60f962e60b7.sol#70-71)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/24/0xc85b0c4874b8f06bfb3f9b65f252d60f962e60b7.sol#26:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/24/0xc85b0c4874b8f06bfb3f9b65f252d60f962e60b7.sol#369-370:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
